ygData.subject: Re: When is the daily server down time for Innoruuk?
ygData.msgSnippet: nope, just with the Freeport militia. The Commons innkeepers actually kindly consider me. I can get stuff cheap from them now. heeh ... -- Gary Qui Hong Loong
ygData.messageBody:
nope, just with the Freeport militia. The Commons innkeepers actually
kindly consider me. I can get stuff cheap from them now. heeh

LKW wrote:

> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Ah, u killed the militia guard in the bank? LOL.
> I know some lvl 12-13 players did that for xp and loot, but no matter what,
> killing a human npc will spoil the faction between you and the human race.
>
> On Tuesday, June 08, 1999 5:30 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
> [SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> >
> > heheh I need u to bind me at West Gate far away from the gates as I'm
> now
> > KOS by freeport militia. heheh
> >
> >
> > LKW wrote:
> >
> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > >
> > > When is the daily server down time for Innoruuk?
> > >
> > > How long will it down normally?
> > >
> > > Btw, I finally reach lvl 12 last night with lots of help from Leshrec
> (for
> > > bringing my hunting and let me getting all the loot for my scrolls),
> Garren
> > > (for making a great hunting team and sacrifice himself in luring
> monsters
> > > and also giving up his loots), Kenven (for tanking me many times),
> Trifrost
> > > (for most of the buff spells I get during hunting) and guys. Lvl 12
> means a
> > > big deal to me as it open my knowledge to one of the most important
> spells
> > > for wizard - bind aff. If anyone need bind in Freeport, pls feel free
> to
> > > give me a tell. Most probably I will stay around FP until I get to lvl
> 16
> > > which I need to buy need spells.
> > >
> > > Meanwhile, I've bought shock of lighting, bind & halo of light spells.
> > > Leshrec can advise what other impt scrolls I shld buy? I'm also
> looking
> > > for a runed totem stave. I've got 15pp in bank right now. If you guys
> > > know any friend who is willing to sell at 25pp and below, pls let me
> know
> > > (Leshrec got his at 20pp, very good buy). Tonight I will con't to
> group
> > > our local kakis for more xp and money, hahahahahaahh! ;-? Thx alot
> guys!
> > >
> > > Ziltus (call me "Zil' will do)
> > >
